title: The House of Lost Wives
description:
Secrets. Lies.

And four missing wives.
 1813. Lizzie's beloved older sister Esme is sold in marriage to the aging Lord Blountford to settle their father's debts.  One year later, Esme is dead, and Lizzie is sent to take her place as Lord Blountford's next wife. Arriving at Ambletye Manor, Lizzie uncovers a twisted web of secrets, not least that she is to be the fifth mistress of this house.Marisa. Anne. Pansy. Esme.What happened to the four wives who came before her?In possession of a unique gift, only Lizzie can hear their stories, and try to find a way to save herself from sharing the same fate.
author: Rebecca   Hardy
